<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_relationship"><sys_relationship action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><advanced>false</advanced><apply_to/><basic_apply_to>x_bllt_bs_cc_inquiry</basic_apply_to><basic_query_from>x_bllt_bs_cc_inquiry</basic_query_from><insert_callback/><name>同一のメールアドレス</name><query_from/><query_with><![CDATA[/*(function refineQuery(current, parent) {

	var INQGR = new GlideRecord('x_bllt_bs_cc_inquiry');
	INQGR.addNotNullQuery('u_mailaddress');
	INQGR.addQuery('u_mailaddress', parent.u_mailaddress);
	INQGR.addNotNullQuery('u_mailaddress');
	INQGR.query();

	var n = INQGR.getRowCount();
	var Ids = '';

	while (INQGR.next()) {
		//レコードのメールアドレスと同一のレコードを羅列
		if (n==0) {
			Ids += INQGR.sys_id + ',';
		}else
			Ids = Ids + ',' + INQGR.sys_id;
	}

	
	current.addQuery('sys_id', 'IN', Ids);

})(current, parent);*/]]></query_with><reference_field/><related_list/><simple_reference>false</simple_reference><sys_class_name>sys_relationship</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>muramatsu.keishin@blueship.co.jp</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-20 06:30:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>de5627fe1bc816103de3fdd2cd4bcba9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>同一のメールアドレス</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CCテンプレート" source="x_bllt_bs_cc">ff092a9b1bbf86106e132f092a4bcb30</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CCテンプレート">ff092a9b1bbf86106e132f092a4bcb30</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_relationship_de5627fe1bc816103de3fdd2cd4bcba9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>muramatsu.keishin@blueship.co.jp</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-21 05:10:55</sys_updated_on></sys_relationship><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=de5627fe1bc816103de3fdd2cd4bcba9"/><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey>de5627fe1bc816103de3fdd2cd4bcba9</documentkey><fieldname>name</fieldname><language>ja</language><sys_created_by>muramatsu.keishin@blueship.co.jp</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-20 06:30:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>81b6abfe1bc816103de3fdd2cd4bcb80</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>muramatsu.keishin@blueship.co.jp</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-21 01:47:30</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_relationship</tablename><value>同一のメールアドレス</value></sys_translated_text></record_update>
